menu.name: mainroad
menu.prompt: You are on a road that heads East and West of your position. Which way will you go?

menu.name: spider
menu.prompt: You travel down the road, about only 100 metres and you encounter a giant spider with vicious poison coated fangs. its hideous appearance causes your throat to dry and your knees to shake! What on earth will you do?

choices.choice: Attempt to attack the spider with your sword.
Throw your sword in the off chance it might kill it.

menu.name: spiderattack
menu.prompt: You viscously swing your sword at the spiders general direction. The swing was so great, your arms jolts out of place, creating a surge of pain. Your arm is now broken, and you fall to the ground in pain... The spider launches 3 metres straight into your body... What on earth is it doing? Oh My God! The spider is devouring everything... All that remained was bones of the once mobile adventurer.

menu.name: brickhouse
menu.prompt: You discover a brick house whose old front door is slightly ajar.

choices.choice: Go back the other way down the road.
Wander around the house looking for another way in.

menu.name: brickhouse1
menu.prompt: You enter the house. An old lady is there and she offers you some soup.

choices.choice: Scream at the woman for being a witch.
Leave and go back down the road the way you came.

menu.name: dragon
menu.prompt: As you stand there in the middle of the road, eventually you notice a large bird circling overhead. Wait, no, it's not a bird. It's a... it's a.... DRAGON!!! You are roasted alive by a giant dragon.

menu.name: house1_around
menu.prompt: You wander around the house. You step on a rusty nail. It gets infected and you die.
